pullRequest.body:
Together with #22075 this should completely remove uses of `cases'` from `Mathlib`, `Archive` and `Counterexamples`.

See [Zulip](https://leanprover.zulipchat.com/#narrow/channel/287929-mathlib4/topic/The.20plan.20to.20remove.20cases'/near/500654728).

nodes.body:
### PR summary [b3e511d929](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/22079/commits/b3e511d9297d03b3a00c69eaa02e6f4c3045366a)

#### Import changes for modified files

No significant changes to the import graph


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|

</details>

---

#### Declarations diff

No declarations were harmed in the making of this PR! üêô
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

---

<details><summary>No changes to technical debt.</summary>

You can run this locally as
```
./scripts/technical-debt-metrics.sh pr_summary
```
* The `relative` value is the weighted *sum* of the differences with weight given by the *inverse* of the current value of the statistic.
* The `absolute` value is the `relative` value divided by the total sum of the inverses of the current values (i.e. the weighted *average* of the differences).
</details>
I don't really like how this is becoming significantly longer.
@urkud [said on Zulip](https://leanprover.zulipchat.com/#narrow/channel/287929-mathlib4/topic/The.20plan.20to.20remove.20cases'/near/500222566) that it's OK if there are no shorter options.
I don't think that's what Yury communicated there on Zulip. I think this particular example should be discussed on Zulip. Otherwise I am happy with this PR.
@j-loreaux I've committed what should be a better replacement, based on [this](https://leanprover.zulipchat.com/#narrow/channel/287929-mathlib4/topic/cases'.20in.20Data.2FSeq.2FSeq/near/502693277).

pullRequest.title: chore: manually deprime `cases'`, part 2
